jchess.ruleengine

Class KingRulesProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.ruleengine.KingRulesProcessor

  • public final class KingRulesProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a custom class specific to process the custom rules that are specific to the King piece only. This class defines all the custom rules that at the moment are not supportable in XML.
    Since:
    21 Jan 2020
    Author:
    Kenneth Allan
